title: Work Management Software & Tool for Any Business • Asana
content: Use Caseschevron-right icon Work Managementchevron-right icon Work management software for any business Coordinate plans, projects, and processes—across your entire organization—with Asana. And empower every team to focus on executing the work that grows your business. Why Asana? Increase productivity Teams using Asana are 45% more efficient. Automate routine work. Turn communication into action. And bring good ideas to life faster. Streamline management According to 82% of customers, Asana gives teams greater clarity. Because everyone knows the plan, the process, and where work stands. Improve visibility 80% of customers say Asana increases accountability. With everything teams need to know and do in one place, you can stay aligned on responsibilities and goals. Watch Asana in action See how your team can structure work to turn all your goals into actionable plans. Teams that want results trust Asana Empower every team with Asana Simple to deploy There's no extensive documentation to read or hours of training to sit through. Deploy Asana to teams throughout your organization without fuss. Easy to adopt Asana isn't just enjoyable to use. It s also easy to get started, easy to learn, and flexible enough to meet your team s preferences. Dedicated support When you have questions, we're here to help. Whether you just have general questions or want explicit guidance to set up projects and processes. Customizable processes Asana allows you to structure work to suit every team's particular needs. Plan projects, refine processes, innovate faster. All while meeting business goals. Pain free reporting Get real time visibility into work—with as much or as little detail as you desire—so you can quickly identify and address risks. And keep work on track. Open API Enable teams to make the most of Asana. Build custom integrations to add features and automate steps for your specific requirements. Security and privacy Enable SSO or SAML authentication to prevent unauthorized access to your data. Advanced admin controls and data export offer additional oversight. Manage work from anywhere Working remotely or on the go? Check the status of projects and capture new action items with our mobile app. For iOS and Android. Ways to use Asana to manage work Add tasks to multiple projects to prevent duplicate work and  keep everyone in sync across projects and teams. Assign tasks with due dates to teammates so it's clear who's responsible for the work and when it needs to be completed. See how all the pieces of your project fit together with Timeline, so you can keep work on track-even as plans change. Communicate about work with team conversations, project status updates, and task comments directly in Asana. Plus, connect Asana and Slack to turn conversations into trackable action items. Connect all the tools you use Combine Asana with the essential business tools you rely on every day. For streamlined communication and collaboration that supports every team. On every project. Dropbox Google Sheets Microsoft Teams Google Calendar Gmail Google Google Drive Slack 1 2 3 Still have questions? We have answers. Work management in Asana coordinates projects, processes, and ongoing tasks in one platform for clarity across teams. Yes, cross-project tasks can be managed by using multi-homing to add tasks to multiple projects for broader visibility. Task responsibilities can be made clear by assigning tasks with due dates and assignees so it's obvious who owns what and when. Yes, project timelines can be planned by using Timeline view to map out project phases and dependencies. Communication in context can be achieved through in-task comments, project status updates, and Slack integration that keep communication tied to work. Yes, work can be kept coordinated remotely as Asana supports mobile, asynchronous updates, and centralized task tracking. Yes, dashboards can be used for oversight as Dashboards offer charts and real-time metrics for workload and project health. Integrations help by allowing Asana to integrate with Slack, Dropbox, Google Sheets, and 270+ apps to streamline workflows. Yes, this is for strategic planning as connected work and Goals allow planning from company strategy to everyday tasks.
